title: Poacher's Dirk should just be removed at this point.
body:
{{item:3252}} Poacher's Dirk is quite literally useless. Why would I buy an item for 600 gold, then go risk my life once every 50 seconds to go kill an enemy jungler's camp. Just purely for the "great reward" of saving 700 gold. In total if you killed the enemy's camp perfectly at 50 seconds right as it refreshes, it would take you 2:30 seconds to transform Poacher's Dirk into Serrated Dirk. 

Now not only do you have to risk going into the enemy's jungle every 50 seconds, you have to pray that every time, you not only find a camp that isn't already killed, you have to hope that the whole enemy team doesn't collapse on you and kill you instantly. Plus all the time you are gone, the enemy jungler could be stealing your blue!!

Basically, in short, Rito either needs to buff Poacher's Dirk in some form, or they might as well remove it.

> [{quoted}](name=The Milky Bae,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=c1VtPbt4,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-05-22T16:12:11.767+0000)
>
> {{item:3252}} Poacher&#039;s Dirk is quite literally useless. Why would I buy an item for 600 gold, then go risk my life once every 50 seconds to go kill an enemy jungler&#039;s camp. Just purely for the &quot;great reward&quot; of saving 700 gold. In total if you killed the enemy&#039;s camp perfectly at 50 seconds right as it refreshes, it would take you 2:30 seconds to transform Poacher&#039;s Dirk into Serrated Dirk. 

You say that like 700 gold is not a significant amount of gold. Like... seriously? "Why would I buy an item for 600 gold that gives me 700 gold?" That's really a question you have to ask like you can't figure it out? Yes, it takes longer to turn a Poacher's Dirk into a Serrated Dirk than it takes to just buy a Serrated Dirk, but it's faster to turn a Poacher's Dirk into a Youmuu's/Duskblade/Edge of Night than it is to turn a normal Serrated Dirk into one. It's a risk-reward item. You're getting your Serrated Dirk slower so that you can _finish_ it faster by being able to put that 700 gold you saved into the other components.

> Now not only do you have to risk going into the enemy&#039;s jungle every 50 seconds, you have to pray that every time, you not only find a camp that isn&#039;t already killed, you have to hope that the whole enemy team doesn&#039;t collapse on you and kill you instantly. Plus all the time you are gone, the enemy jungler could be stealing your blue!!

All this tells me is that you don't understand how to counter jungle properly. That 'the enemy jungler could be stealing your blue' in particular is the worst damn excuse for anything. Yeah, he could be. He could also be taking blue while you're ganking, or he could be taking dragon or rift herald while you're taking your own blue. The enemy jungler isn't going to just sit on his ass twiddling his thumbs while you do things. In fact, as a jungler, part of your job for the team is to try and keep track of whether the other jungler is at any given point in time, either by tracking his jungle route or through wards. And hey, when you're dropping wards to scout for him, maybe you see a camp he hasn't taken yet. Assuming you're not bad, you should be taking that anyways just to deny him it, and if you have a poacher's dirk then that's an extra reward for doing it. Enemy team is starting to collapse on you? Good thing you were watching the minimap and those wards you just dropped so you know to quit what you're doing and get the hell out of there.

What is really needed is other items similar to poachers dirk that offer other buildpaths. Like an item that costs X amount of gold that turns into a giants belt....or an ap item. The fact that there are very few junglers who can even use serrated in their builds means people just forget the item exists usually....which wouldnt be the case if EVERY jungler could build an item that was risk vs reward like that.

Even if it was buffed, there aren't as many junglers as there are mid and top laners who actually build dirk.
I believe there used to be a jungle item that had this effect, and it was removed for the exact same reasons that OP is noting Poacher's Dirk is useless for.
There used to be a smite upgrade that gave you more money and or speed from stealing camps.
It should just randomly choose an enemy camp or one of the 2 buffs to transform it and only require one steal. That way it would actually give initiative.

I notice they regularly make items for playing on the enemy jungle but they always have shitty stats.  My biggest concern invading is getting caught and not escaping.  AD won't help me with that, wards might, health might, but its not great outside of on Nunu.  Where's an item with movespeed for being on the enemy side?  Why isn't there something that actually acknowledges that going across the river from your jungle risks time which if your enemy is farming normally has to spare?
Git gud, counterjungling isn't that hard or scary
But why risk counterjungling for an item you could easily just farm up for?

Combined with the counter jungling you could easily be 1000 gold ahead of the other jungler.

And if you are aware of how counterjungling works there is 0 risk.

I don't disagree with the idea of counterjungling, it can be very useful, but why do it just for one item which you could buy anyways?

And depending on when and how you counterjungle, there's always the risk of running into the enemy jungler who might even be able to 1v1 you, or be close enough to an ally laner who will help them.

Homie you completely ignored my argument.  Item + Counterjungle you get way ahead in gold.  When you combine gold from their camps, gold they lost, and what you save on the dirk you are way ahead in gold.

And yeah it depends on how and when, so you counterjungle when it is safe.  You need to pay attention to the game and not just automatically buy it every single game.
